msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msItem.title: The Divan of Hafiz followed by the Pandnamah attributed to Sa'di and with the Bustan of Sa'di written diagonally in the margins.
msItem.note: F1a: scribbling, presumably defacing the name of a previous (European) owner, beside the date 1787. F1b, signature of David Price. Front flyleaf: Presented by Major Price. (In Morley's hand?) The Hafiz has the preface of Muhammad Gulandam. Ruled margins and dividing panels in red. Headings also in red.
msItem.incipit: Hamd u thana-yi bi-hadd wa sipas-i bi-qiyas [sic]

layoutDesc.p: 15 lines to the page in double columns

handNote.persName: Mirza Muhammad Amin, known as Mirza Muhammad Jan son of the late Baqir Khan Sahib

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
